channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI is reportedly asking contractors to upload real work from past jobs
item.description: An intellectual property lawyer says OpenAI is "putting itself at great risk" with this approach.

item.title: SAG-AFTRA Is Keeping an Eye on the Disney/OpenAI Deal
item.description: Not everyone liked hearing Disney got into bed with OpenAI, but SAG-AFTRA thinks it could be good for transparency and progress.

item.title: GameStop reportedly shuts down more than 400 US stores
item.description: Your neighborhood GameStop might be on the chopping block, along with more than 400 other retail locations across the US. As first reported by Polygon, the retailer is pursuing a severe cost-saving measure by closing up several hundred physical locations. According to a blog that keeps track of GameStop closures, there are 410 locations that are confirmed to be closing or are already closed, along with another 11 that are reportedly also on their way, as of January 10. As Polygon indicated, these closings aren't much of a surprise considering GameStop's SEC filing for December 2025 indicated ...

item.title: The FCC is letting SpaceX launch 7,500 more Starlink satellites
item.description: The FCC approved SpaceX's plan to launch an additional 7,500 Gen2 Starlink satellites on Friday. That brings the total number of satellites the company will have in orbit to around 15,000 worldwide. As part of the approval, the government is also waiving previous requirements that prevented overlapping coverage and enhanced capacity. SpaceX originally sought approval […]...

item.title: Elon Musk Says In One Week He Will Fully Reveal Why Your X Timeline Is… Like That
item.description: He’s been claiming he would make the algorithm open source since 2022.

item.title: I tested the Leica Q3 Monochrom – it's a top digital camera for black-and-white photography purists
item.description: Leica's third premium compact Q3 model – the new Q3 Monochrom – follows the original Q3 and the Q3 43, ditching the sensor's color array filter in favor of optimized black and white-only images.

item.title: A ‘Baldur’s Gate 3’ Writer Explains Wyll’s Disappointing Arc
item.description: If you're still sore about Wyll, Larian hears you and absolutely agrees.

item.title: Indonesia blocks Grok over non-consensual, sexualized deepfakes
item.description: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.

item.title: Beware Instagram reset password scams that users report are on the rise
item.description: Instagram password reset scams are everywhere, users report. As always, don't click any sketchy links.

item.title: Google Photos might soon give you more control over how your photos and videos are backed up
item.description: It looks as though a scheduling feature could be introduced to Google Photos in the near future.

item.title: I tested the Geekom A7 Max - a mini PC built around a punchy platform, but the installed memory is an issue
item.description: The Geekom A7 Max is a high-quality NUC that needs some extra expenditure on memory to truly shine.
